summary: A shallow Broadway press agent learns he is dying just as his son by his ex-wife arrives for a visit.
cast: Jack Lemmon|Robby Benson|Lee Remick|Colleen Dewhurst|John Marley|Kim Cattrall|Gale Garnett|Teri Keane|Rummy Bishop|John Dee|Bob Windsor|Eileen Lehman|Andrew Foot|Trevor Daley|Sid Smith|Jennifer Goldie|Bill McMann|Gaylyn Britton|Peter Peers|Anthony Powers|Bob Scarantino|Michael Monet
title: Tributo
